sources.title: Meet Mr. Callaghan
sources.description: Title: Meet Mr. Callaghan Summary: Direputable Private Detective Slim Callaghan is hired to investigate a murder and a will change in London. Directed by: Charles Saunders Actors: Robert Adair, Delphi Lawrence, Derrick De Marney Production Company: Pinnacle Productions Release Date: June 1954 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Direputable Private Detective Slim Callaghan is hired to investigate a murder and a will change in London.
